Lewis Stein

Portraits of Presidents, This is a series of images of 8 consecutive Presidents of the United States. The images derive from Official Portraits (for the first 2 images) and Official White House Portraits for the remainder. Using a commercial process the images are to be printed (from a digital file) as 120‚Äù high (305 cm) paintings on canvas.
